SELECT CO_ID as coId , DEVICE_ID as deviceId , DEVICE_NM as deviceNm , DEVICE_DIV as deviceDiv , FW_INFO as fwInfo , DEVICE_SPEC as deviceSpec , DEVICE_RMKS as deviceRmks , CASE USE_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END as useYn , REGPSN_ID as regpsnId , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDtm , UPD_ID as updId , UPD_DTM as updDtm , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by co_id) as rowno , MAC_ADDR as macAddr FROM PUBLIC.TB_DEVICE WHERE CO_ID = #coId#
AND DEVICE_NM ILIKE concat('%'||coalesce(#deviceNm#,'')||'%')
AND USE_YN = #useYn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PUBLIC.TB_DEVICE ( CO_ID, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_NM, FW_INFO, DEVICE_RMKS, USE_YN, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM, DEL_YN, MAC_ADDR ) VALUES ( #sessionCoId#, #deviceId#, #deviceNm#, #fwInfo#, #deviceRmks#, #useYn#, #sessionUserId#, NOW(), 'N', #macAddr# )

UPDATE PUBLIC.TB_DEVICE SET DEVICE_NM = #deviceNm# , FW_INFO = #fwInfo# , DEVICE_RMKS = #deviceRmks# , USE_YN = #useYn# , UPD_ID = #sessionUserId# , UPD_DTM = NOW() , MAC_ADDR = #macAddr# WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
